name: Fast & Blast
description:
--- NOTE ---

most of the gameplay is in multiplayer

--- lore hide & seek ---

you play hide and seek but with knifes

--- lore knife tag ---

you play tag but everyone has knife and you need to hit people with knife
to get point

--- lore horror ---

you have been locked to maze kind of laboratory and there is ball monster
you need to survive long as possible if you die balls will take over

--- lore survival "balls" ---

you live in universe where boxes live but project balls got wild project balls escaped from lab
and started killing boxes after that operation balls was made where you are in
you need to destroy all balls to win this war with multiple weapons found in game

--- graphics ---

-not so good graphics for up to date
-not so well done models

--- gameplay ---

-boring gameplay
-half of movement is broken
-avaible to run over walls
-singleplayer is not completed multiplayer is only almost playable thing in game
-after jump it just continues until releasing jump key
-avaible to slide forever

--- multiplayer ---

-survival "balls" game mode has only one ball
-if over 2 players then player object teleports
-"hammer of speed" is broken
-deathmatch works pretty well

--- controls ---
-game resolution 640 x 480
-move left A
-move right D
-move forward W
-move back S
-move camera MOUSE
-start multiplayer 1 or 2
-change multiplayer mode F1, F2, F3, F4
-shoot LEFT CLICK MOUSE
-scope with sniper RIGHT CLICK MOUSE
-change ability or gun RIGHT CLICK MOUSE
-jump SPACE
-crounch CTRL
-run SHIFT
-activate bot B
-disable bot N
-disable mouse lock P
-change object top of head X
-change music M
-exit ESC
